alert.note: Alert for Crowley; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 23 at 1:32AM MDT until June 24 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River Near Nepesta affecting Pueblo County. Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. Arkansas River Near Fowler affecting Crowley and Otero Counties. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Pueblo, Avondale, Nepesta, Fowler, Rocky Ford, La Junta, Lamar...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River Near Fowler. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.5 feet, Minor Flood. Minor agricultural flooding occurs northeast of Rocky Ford and elsewhere. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 PM MDT Thursday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to flood stage this evening. It will then fall to 11.8 feet early Monday morning. It will rise to 11.9 feet Tuesday evening. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 13.5 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 130 PM MDT.
